title: Beyond Good and Evil - NTSC - PS2 [~DementedLullaby~]
description:
Beyond Good and Evil, It was designed by Michel Ancel (creator of Rayman), developed by Ubisoft in-house (with Ancel on the team) and released in late 2003. It focuses around the exploits of Jade, a female reporter and the game&#039;s protagonist. Tyrone Miller, a public relations manager for Ubisoft, said the title comes from a "need to investigate beyond the superficial facts of what is good and what is evil."

This was one of the most overlooked game of 2003 because it was released around the holiday season and alot of the companies released there big guns back then so this great game was overshadowed by those shit games of 03.

Designer

Engine: JADE engine
HDL mode: Mode 3 (if you have sound problems)

If you have a PAL Slim PS2, you might have some problems with the sound.
This is the only problem I had people talk to me about. and it&#039;s only PAL all slim PS2s that are affected.. Other than that. it should be good.
